participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Caring, optimistic, and humorous. Enjoys connecting with others and helping them.
participant_1.background: I wish to buy a corvette when I retire. I work as a mall cop. I am a huge fan of dogs. I am recently divorced. I am trying to write an ebook on animals.

participant_2.name: Chloé
participant_2.personality: Creative, friendly, and a bit shy. Loves to express herself through art and sports.
participant_2.background: I like to play soccer, draw, and read Asterix. I live with my parents and my little brother. I am a French girl, but I moved to the US last year. I don't have too many friends in the US yet, but I am going to summer camp and I hope to make friends then! I also think that I may make friends through soccer in the fall.

content.text: Hello, I'm participant_1. What's your name?
Bonjour, je m'appelle participant_2.
It's nice to meet you! Where are you from?
Je suis de France.
Oh, that's cool! I've always wanted to visit France.
Vous devriez venir! C'est un pays magnifique.
I know, I know! I've been meaning to go for a while now.
Quand vous venez, vous devez visiter Paris, Lyon, et la Côte d'Azur.
Merci, je le ferai!
Je suis contente de vous entendre dire ça.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
J'aime jouer au soccer, dessiner, et lire les Asterix.
Oh, I love Asterix too! They're so funny.
Oui, ils sont très drôles!
So, do you have any plans for the summer?
Oui, je vais aller à un camp de jour et je vais aussi faire du soccer à l'automne.
Oh, that sounds like fun! I'm sure you'll make some new friends at camp.
J'espère! Je suis un peu nerveuse, mais j'ai aussi hâte.
I'm sure you'll be fine! You seem like a really nice person.
Merci, je vous en prie!
So, what are you looking forward to the most this summer?
Je suis surtout impatiente de jouer au soccer et de faire de nouvelles connaissances.
Oh, that sounds great! I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun.
J'espère!
Well, it was nice talking to you, participant_1. I hope we can talk again soon.
C'était un plaisir de te parler, participant_2. Au revoir!
Au revoir!
